setAsides.name: Total Small Business Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A procurement set aside exclusively for small businesses where the entire requirement is reserved for small business competition
eligibilityRequirements: Must qualify as a small business under applicable NAICS code
Must be registered in SAM.gov
Must represent that it is a small business at the time of offer

procurementThreshold.notes: Generally used for acquisitions over the micro-purchase threshold up to the simplified acquisition threshold

setAsides.name: Partial Small Business Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A procurement where a portion of the requirement is set aside for small businesses while the remainder is open to all businesses
eligibilityRequirements: Must qualify as a small business under applicable NAICS code for the set-aside portion
Must be registered in SAM.gov
Large businesses may compete for the non-set-aside portion

procurementThreshold.notes: Used when market research indicates insufficient small businesses for the entire requirement

setAsides.name: 8(a) Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A competitive procurement set aside for businesses participating in SBA's 8(a) Business Development Program
eligibilityRequirements: Must be a current participant in the SBA 8(a) Business Development Program
Must be in good standing with the program
Must be eligible for award based on business activity targets

procurementThreshold.notes: No specific dollar thresholds for competitive 8(a) set-asides

setAsides.name: 8(a) Sole Source
setAsides.description: A sole source award to a specific 8(a) participant without competition
eligibilityRequirements: Must be a current participant in the SBA 8(a) Business Development Program
Must be nominated by SBA for the specific procurement
Must meet size standards and business activity targets

procurementThreshold.notes: $7M for manufacturing, $4.5M for other acquisitions (including options)

setAsides.name: HUBZone Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A competitive procurement set aside for certified HUBZone small businesses
eligibilityRequirements: Must be certified as a HUBZone small business by SBA
Must maintain principal office in a HUBZone
At least 35% of employees must reside in a HUBZone

procurementThreshold.notes: No specific dollar thresholds for competitive HUBZone set-asides

setAsides.name: HUBZone Sole Source
setAsides.fullName: Historically Underutilized Business Zone Sole Source (FAR 19.13)
setAsides.description: A sole source award to a specific HUBZone small business
eligibilityRequirements: Must be certified as a HUBZone small business by SBA
Only one HUBZone small business can satisfy the requirement
Award must not exceed specific thresholds

procurementThreshold.notes: $7M for manufacturing, $4.5M for other acquisitions (including options)

setAsides.name: SDVOSB Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A competitive procurement set aside for service-disabled veteran-owned small businesses
eligibilityRequirements: Must be verified as SDVOSB in SAM.gov or VA's VetBiz
51% owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans
Must qualify as small business under applicable NAICS code

procurementThreshold.notes: No specific dollar thresholds for competitive SDVOSB set-asides

setAsides.name: SDVOSB Sole Source
setAsides.fullName: Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business Sole Source (FAR 19.14)
setAsides.description: A sole source award to a specific service-disabled veteran-owned small business
eligibilityRequirements: Must be verified as SDVOSB in SAM.gov or VA's VetBiz
Contracting officer determines only one SDVOSB can satisfy requirement
Award must not exceed specific thresholds

procurementThreshold.notes: $7M for manufacturing, $4.5M for other acquisitions (including options)

setAsides.name: WOSB Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A competitive procurement set aside for women-owned small businesses in eligible industries
eligibilityRequirements: Must be certified as WOSB by SBA or approved third-party certifier
Must compete in WOSB-eligible NAICS codes
51% owned and controlled by women

procurementThreshold.notes: Used in industries where WOSBs are underrepresented

setAsides.name: WOSB Sole Source
setAsides.fullName: Women-Owned Small Business Program Sole Source (FAR 19.15)
setAsides.description: A sole source award to a specific women-owned small business
eligibilityRequirements: Must be certified as WOSB by SBA or approved third-party certifier
Only one WOSB can satisfy the requirement
Must be in WOSB-eligible NAICS code

procurementThreshold.notes: $7M for manufacturing, $4.5M for other acquisitions (including options)

setAsides.name: EDWOSB Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A competitive procurement set aside for economically disadvantaged women-owned small businesses
eligibilityRequirements: Must be certified as EDWOSB by SBA or approved third-party certifier
Must compete in EDWOSB-eligible NAICS codes
Must meet economic disadvantage criteria

procurementThreshold.notes: Used in industries where EDWOSBs are substantially underrepresented

setAsides.name: EDWOSB Sole Source
setAsides.fullName: Economically Disadvantaged WOSB Program Sole Source (FAR 19.15)
setAsides.description: A sole source award to a specific economically disadvantaged women-owned small business
eligibilityRequirements: Must be certified as EDWOSB by SBA or approved third-party certifier
Only one EDWOSB can satisfy the requirement
Must be in EDWOSB-eligible NAICS code

procurementThreshold.notes: $7M for manufacturing, $4.5M for other acquisitions (including options)

setAsides.name: Local Area Set-Aside
setAsides.description: A set-aside for businesses in a specific geographic area, typically for disaster relief or local economic development
eligibilityRequirements: Must be located in the designated local area
Must perform or agree to perform substantial work in the local area
May combine with small business set-asides

procurementThreshold.notes: Used for disaster relief and local area economic support

setAsides.name: Indian Economic Enterprise Set-Aside
setAsides.fullName: Indian Economic Enterprise Set-Aside (Department of Interior)
setAsides.description: Set-aside specific to Department of Interior for Indian Economic Enterprises
eligibilityRequirements: Must be an Indian Economic Enterprise as defined by Bureau of Indian Affairs
51% or more Indian owned
Specific to Department of Interior contracts

procurementThreshold.notes: Department of Interior specific thresholds apply

setAsides.name: Indian Small Business Economic Enterprise Set-Aside
setAsides.fullName: Indian Small Business Economic Enterprise Set-Aside (Department of Interior)
setAsides.description: Set-aside for Indian-owned small businesses specific to Department of Interior
eligibilityRequirements: Must be an Indian Small Business Economic Enterprise
Must meet SBA size standards
51% or more Indian owned
Specific to Department of Interior contracts

procurementThreshold.notes: Department of Interior specific thresholds apply

setAsides.name: Buy Indian Set-Aside
setAsides.fullName: Buy Indian Set-Aside (HHS Indian Health Services)
setAsides.description: Set-aside for Indian-owned businesses specific to Department of Health and Human Services, Indian Health Services
eligibilityRequirements: Must be an Indian Economic Enterprise
51% or more owned by enrolled members of federally recognized tribes
Specific to IHS and tribal contracts

procurementThreshold.notes: Indian Health Services specific thresholds apply

setAsides.name: Veteran-Owned Small Business Set-Aside
setAsides.fullName: Veteran-Owned Small Business Set-Aside (Department of Veterans Affairs)
setAsides.description: Competitive set-aside for veteran-owned small businesses specific to VA contracts
eligibilityRequirements: Must be verified VOSB in VA's VetBiz database
51% owned and controlled by veterans
Specific to VA contracts under Veterans First program

procurementThreshold.notes: VA specific - Veterans First Contracting Program

setAsides.name: Veteran-Owned Small Business Sole Source
setAsides.fullName: Veteran-Owned Small Business Sole Source (Department of Veterans Affairs)
setAsides.description: Sole source award to veteran-owned small businesses specific to VA contracts
eligibilityRequirements: Must be verified VOSB in VA's VetBiz database
Only one VOSB can satisfy the requirement
Specific to VA contracts under Veterans First program

procurementThreshold.notes: VA specific - up to $5M under Veterans First program

metadata.dataSource: Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) and agency-specific supplements
metadata.notes: Set-aside codes and requirements based on current federal regulations. Agency-specific set-asides may have additional requirements.
